title: Where to rent apartments or PG in 4th year ?
content:
I'm a junior in PESU EC campus, where should I rent a place considering placements in RRC and capstone and ISAs in ECC ?

Ps: query is mostly for ECC seniors and grads.

comments.body: PES only calls students to RR campus for interviews right? And at most, there are 2-3 interviews a week. Why would you want to move for this reason? Especially because once you get placed there is effectively no reason to live closer to RR campus.
Yeah and for capstone it's twice a month maybe till 7th sem  and few ISAs during 7th sem , after 7th sem I don't see any seniors coming to college for anything.

Yeah so I personally don't see moving as a viable option here. If you are from Bangalore, just live with your parents until the end of 7th sem. After that, based on where you get placed, you might need to move anyway.
